author: Kurt Wagner
description: Stone is re-joining to help build back Twitter’s culture.
title: Twitter co-founder Biz Stone is returning to Twitter

author: Kurt Wagner
description: Hoffman was at Twitter for almost seven years.
title: Twitter’s media boss, Ross Hoffman, is leaving the company

author: Rachel Kaser
description:
The official Twitter account of Sweden was at the center of controversy after the person using it blocked 14k people en masse.

Sweden boasts a very democratic official Twitter account. ...
title: Sweden’s Twitter account blocked and unblocked 14,000 people

author: Denis Campbell
description: Poll of 14- to 24-year-olds shows Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat and Twitter increased feelings of inadequacy and anxiety
title: Facebook and Twitter 'harm young people's mental health'

author: Rachel Kaser
description:
Biz Stone, one of the co-founders of Twitter Inc, is rejoining his company full-time after a 6-year hiatus.

Stone stepped back from Twitter in 2011. Since then he's worked on several ...
title: Twitter co-founder Biz Stone is rejoining the company after six years

author: BARBARA ORTUTAY
description: NEW YORK (AP) — Twitter's new privacy policy suggests ambitions of becoming more like Facebook — more tracking of users and more targeting of ads to rake in more money. Twitter recently reported its first quarterly revenue decline since going public. That should give you some clues about the reasons behind the policy changes, which take effect June 18. WHAT'S CHANGING? Twitter was already tracking users. For example, if you visited a webpage that had an embedded tweet or a button to share something on Twitter, you could be tracked and targeted.
title: What Twitter's privacy changes mean for you

author: Jessica Guynn
description: Biz Stone, Twitter's former evangelist-in-chief, who left the struggling social media company in 2011, is returning to the flock to aid CEO Jack Dorsey and guide the company culture.
title: Twitter founder Biz Stone back at Twitter to help Jack Dorsey with culture

author: Georgia Wells
description: Twitter co-founder Biz Stone is rejoining the micro-messaging company to focus on its culture, in an attempt to revive morale amid executive departures and slumping growth.
title: Twitter Co-Founder Biz Stone Returns to the Coop

author: Matthias Olschewski und Chris Weller
description: Studienanfänger aufgepasst: Der reichste Mann der Welt erklärt auf Twitter, was er heute studieren würde und wo er die Zukunft sieht.
title: Bill Gates gibt Karrieretipps auf Twitter

author: Matt Weinberger
description: Twitter's Biz Stone and Jack Dorsey have mended fences, and Stone will be joining up to help guide company culture.
title: Twitter cofounder Biz Stone is rejoining the company, and its stock is up
